document.full_text: the federal government's ban on allowing the district of columbia to use local money to fund abortions for poor women served as a bitter reminder of the district's powerlessness.
document.title: abortion limit is renewed, as is washington anger
lines_and_colors: the federal government's ban on allowing the district of columbia to use local money to fund abortions for poor women served as a bitter reminder of the district's powerlessness.
